package.name: follow_the_gap_v0_ride
package.description:
Follow The Gap algorithm implementation. See 'README.md' for more information.
Note: Public version is available at https://github.com/CTU-IIG/f1t-ftg/. Note: This version contains also FTGR (Follow The Gap Ride node), which was removed in the public version. Note: FTG code was sanitized and checked by BUT. It should be completely safe and free of errors. (v. 0.2.0)
package.author: Anders Solberg Pedersen
Jaroslav Klapálek
